channel.title: Need help setting up gtl vote
channel.description: When i try to claim my prize it says gtl [GTL Vote] SQL Error occured. It was pre added and i tryed changing the database name database address user and pass and that didnt work i set up everything correctly websided so there is a problem server sided any who can help please dont be shy. willing to reward generously

item.title: Need help setting up gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @Nicksworld Nicksworld
item.description:
@Nicksworld wrote:

yes i am sure they’re allowed i went to remote sql and put my server’s no-ip and now i get access denied anytime i try to start my source which means in remotesql my server ip isn’t correct but if it’s not my no-ip idk what it is then

Read full topic
item.source: Need help setting up gtl vote

item.title: Need help setting up gtl vote
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Nicksworld:

When i try to claim my prize it says gtl [GTL Vote] SQL Error occured. It was pre added and i tryed changing the database name database address user and pass and that didnt work i set up everything correctly websided so there is a problem server sided any who can help please dont be shy. willing to reward generously

Rewards aren’t allowed here, help is 100% free.

Are you sure your webhost allows remote mysql? It’s required for the vote system.
And double check that all the database info and such are correct.

Read full topic
